name: Xark
description:
** Currently only supports the Vive **
** Currently in early access / alpha testing **

Delve deep into hidden dungeons. Explore, fight, find, level up.

Featuring:
Randomly generated dungeons
Difficult combat
Traps
Interesting AI
Real world locomotion
Throwing weapons
Swordplay

With more coming soon!

Understand that this is currently an Alpha, and as such we are letting people play for free. Expect there to be some bugs, issues, and an underwhelming amount of content for now.
